plans.premiums: Refer to 2025 Monthly Contribution Table (Typically categorized by salary bands P0-P5000, P5001-P10000, etc.)
plans.annual_limit: In-Patient: BWP 2,215,000 (Single) / BWP 4,251,000 (Family); Out-Patient: BWP 338,000 (Single) / BWP 836,000 (Family)
plans.co_payment: Diamond 10 attracts 10% co-payment on out-patient services
plans.hospital_network: Private Ward; May obtain service in RSA
plans.maternity_cover: Antenatal Consultations: 6 Visits; Ultrasounds: 4 Scans; Subject to overall IP Limit
plans.chronic_cover: BWP 44,800 (S) / BWP 69,000 (F); Includes 27 specified conditions (e.g., Hypertension, Diabetes, HIV/AIDS)
plans.dental_optical: Basic Dentistry: BWP 12,900 (S) / BWP 19,000 (F); Optical: BWP 6,000 per beneficiary every 24 months
plans.waiting_period: Standard industry periods apply: 9 months for maternity, 12 months for pre-existing conditions (unless waived)

plans.annual_limit: In-Patient: BWP 1,448,000 (S) / BWP 3,407,000 (F); Out-Patient: BWP 269,000 (S) / BWP 670,000 (F)
plans.co_payment: Platinum 10 attracts 10% co-payment on out-patient services
plans.hospital_network: General medical and surgical wards (Private Ward not covered); May obtain service in RSA
plans.maternity_cover: Antenatal Consultations: 5 Visits; Ultrasounds: 3 Scans; Subject to overall IP Limit
plans.dental_optical: Basic Dentistry: BWP 8,300 (S) / BWP 12,100 (F); Optical: BWP 4,200 per beneficiary every 24 months

plans.annual_limit: In-Patient: BWP 1,105,000 (S) / BWP 1,704,000 (F); Out-Patient: BWP 63,000 (S) / BWP 84,000 (F)
plans.co_payment: Ruby 10 attracts 10% co-payment on out-patient services
plans.hospital_network: General medical and surgical wards; May obtain service in RSA
plans.maternity_cover: Antenatal Consultations: 4 Visits; Ultrasounds: 2 Scans; Subject to overall IP Limit
plans.dental_optical: Basic Dentistry: BWP 6,300 (S) / BWP 8,400 (F); Optical: BWP 3,900 per beneficiary every 24 months

plans.annual_limit: In-Patient: BWP 169,000 (S) / BWP 422,000 (F); Out-Patient: BWP 50,000 (S) / BWP 125,000 (F)
plans.co_payment: Standard 10% on certain services as per scheme rules
plans.hospital_network: General medical and surgical wards only; Service in Botswana
plans.maternity_cover: Antenatal Consultations: 4 Visits; Ultrasounds: 2 Scans; BWP 12,000 limit for neonatal care
plans.dental_optical: Basic Dentistry: BWP 3,700 (S) / BWP 4,700 (F); Optical: BWP 1,200 per beneficiary every 24 months
